timeline.message:
Removed legacy variable OK_TESTS="DISABLE_LOGIN"

It was used for tests to turn off authentication
during testing. Now tests use real credentials.

Removed legacy variable OK_TESTS="DISABLE_LOGIN"

It was used for tests to turn off authentication
during testing. Now tests use real credentials.

timeline.bodyText: We don't have mininet and topology-engine... Is this network.disco.make actual at al?
timeline.author: surabujin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -46,7 +46,7 @@ help:
 up:
 	# NB: just specifying the minimal set .. taking advantage of embedded dependencies to bring
 	#     up the remaining containers
-	OK_TESTS="DISABLE_LOGIN" docker-compose up -d mininet floodlight storm-supervisor \
+	docker-compose up -d mininet floodlight storm-supervisor \

replies.bodyText: looks like it's not actual > 1 year :(
replies.author: niksv
